::Symphony/Composer/Orchestra::

    Symphony went over in a corner, he was=
 no longer in the training room.  He wanted to send a message to IR through=
 his comm-link.

    "Iron Raptor, it's me, Symphony, is there a place that=
 I can speak to you in private and in person?" Symphony asked, his nervousn=
ess showing in his little voice.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Composer felt like going to scout.  He needed some=
thing to do out of the base.

      "My Leader, may I recieve your permissi=
on to go scouting the area around Maximal City?" Composer asked in his usua=
l Silverbolt-honour voice.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Orchestra landed near, not too near though, the Allianc=
e base.  He was on the edge of the island.  He was pacing back and forth, t=
rying to think of something to say.  Propose an alliance with the alliance?=
  A cease-fire or share-info?  Or maybe declare war.  He decided to turn to=
 the boss.

       "Commander Darkfate, posing as your faction's ambassador=
 and looking to talk with the Alliance, what should I tell the Alliance?" O=
rchestra asked.



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~LurkerAbyss~~~~~~~
~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~The Keeper Of Souls~
~The Shadow Of The Dark~
~I Am The =
Lurker Of The Abyss~
